languages.text:
Взрывает труп, на его месте появляется зомби (в зависимости от “ценности цели”).
Если цель “Сварм” — BoardedShip_NurgleZombie_unit. Если цель офицер — BoardedShip_Plaguebearer_unit.

traits.locale_text:
Взрывает труп, на его месте появляется зомби (в зависимости от “ценности цели”).
Если цель “Сварм” — BoardedShip_NurgleZombie_unit. Если цель офицер — BoardedShip_Plaguebearer_unit.

languages.text: This creature blows up a dead ally's body, replacing it with a minion of {g|Encyclopedia:DecayEffect}decay{/g} depending on that ally's type. If the target ally is a guard, a Poxwalker Guard appears in their place. If the target ally is an officer, a Plaguebearer appears in their place.
languages.original_text: Это существо взрывает труп поверженного союзника, заменяя его на отродье разложения.{g|Encyclopedia:DecayEffect}{/g} Если союзник был обычным пиратом, вместо него появляется оспенный мертвец-страж. Если союзник был офицером, вместо него появляется чумоносец.

traits.locale_text: This creature blows up a dead ally's body replacing it with a decay creature depending on that ally's type. If the target ally is a guard, a poxwalker guard appears on their place. If the target ally is an officer, a plaguebearer appears on their place.

This creature blows up a dead ally's body, replacing it with a minion of {g|Encyclopedia:DecayEffect}decay{/g} depending on that ally's type. If the target ally is a guard, a Poxwalker Guard appears in their place. If the target ally is an officer, a Plaguebearer appears in their place.

This creature blows up a dead ally's body, replacing it with a minion of {g|Encyclopedia:DecayEffect}decay{/g} depending on that ally's type. If the target ally is a guard, a Poxwalker Guard appears in their place. If the target ally is an officer, a Plaguebearer appears in their place.

languages.text: Bu yaratık, ölü bir dost birimin cesedini patlatır ve yerine o dost birimin türüne bağlı olarak {g|Encyclopedia:DecayEffect}çürümenin{/g} uşağını yerleştirir. Hedef dost birim muhafızsa yerini bir Taunyürüyen Gardiyan alır. Hedef dost birim subaysa yerini bir Vebataşıyan alır.
languages.original_text: This creature blows up a dead ally's body, replacing it with a minion of {g|Encyclopedia:DecayEffect}decay{/g} depending on that ally's type. If the target ally is a guard, a Poxwalker Guard appears in their place. If the target ally is an officer, a Plaguebearer appears in their place.

traits.locale_text: Bu yaratık, ölü bir dost birimin cesedini patlatır ve yerine o dost birimin türüne bağlı olarak {g|Encyclopedia:DecayEffect}çürümenin{/g} uşağını yerleştirir. Hedef dost birim muhafızsa yerini bir Taunyürüyen Gardiyan alır. Hedef dost birim subaysa yerini bir Vebataşıyan alır.

languages.text: Esta criatura revienta el cadáver de un aliado caído, sustituyéndolo por un siervo de la {g|Encyclopedia:DecayEffect}descomposición{/g} en función del tipo de aliado que sea. Si el aliado objetivo es un guardia, aparece un guardia plagabundo en su lugar. Si el aliado objetivo es un oficial, aparece un portador de plaga en su lugar.
languages.original_text: This creature blows up a dead ally's body, replacing it with a minion of {g|Encyclopedia:DecayEffect}decay{/g} depending on that ally's type. If the target ally is a guard, a Poxwalker Guard appears in their place. If the target ally is an officer, a Plaguebearer appears in their place.

traits.locale_text: Esta criatura revienta el cadáver de un aliado caído, sustituyéndolo por un siervo de la {g|Encyclopedia:DecayEffect}descomposición{/g} en función del tipo de aliado que sea. Si el aliado objetivo es un guardia, aparece un guardia plagabundo en su lugar. Si el aliado objetivo es un oficial, aparece un portador de plaga en su lugar.

languages.text: 炸毁一具死去盟友的躯体，同时根据该盟友的类别，召唤{g|Encyclopedia:DecayEffect}腐朽{/g}的仆从将其取代。如果目标盟友是普通守卫，则会召唤一名瘟疫行者守卫，如果目标盟友是军官，则会召唤一名驱疫使。
languages.original_text: This creature blows up a dead ally's body, replacing it with a minion of {g|Encyclopedia:DecayEffect}decay{/g} depending on that ally's type. If the target ally is a guard, a Poxwalker Guard appears in their place. If the target ally is an officer, a Plaguebearer appears in their place.

traits.locale_text: 炸毁一具死去盟友的躯体，同时根据该盟友的类别，召唤{g|Encyclopedia:DecayEffect}腐朽{/g}的仆从将其取代。如果目标盟友是普通守卫，则会召唤一名瘟疫行者守卫，如果目标盟友是军官，则会召唤一名驱疫使。

languages.text: La créature fait exploser le cadavre d'un allié et le remplace par un serviteur {g|Encyclopedia:DecayEffect}putréfié{/g} qui dépend du type d'allié. Si l'allié est un garde, un garde véroleux prend sa place. Si l'allié est un officier, un portepeste prend sa place.
languages.original_text: This creature blows up a dead ally's body, replacing it with a minion of {g|Encyclopedia:DecayEffect}decay{/g} depending on that ally's type. If the target ally is a guard, a Poxwalker Guard appears in their place. If the target ally is an officer, a Plaguebearer appears in their place.

traits.locale_text: La créature fait exploser le cadavre d'un allié et le remplace par un serviteur {g|Encyclopedia:DecayEffect}putréfié{/g} qui dépend du type d'allié. Si l'allié est un garde, un garde véroleux prend sa place. Si l'allié est un officier, un portepeste prend sa place.

languages.text: この生物は、死んだ味方の体を吹き飛ばし、その味方のタイプによって{g|Encyclopedia:DecayEffect}腐敗{/g}の子分と入れ替える。ターゲットの味方がガードの場合、ポクスウォーカーの護衛がその場所に現れる。ターゲットの味方が士官の場合、プレーグベアラーがその場所に現れる。
languages.original_text: This creature blows up a dead ally's body, replacing it with a minion of {g|Encyclopedia:DecayEffect}decay{/g} depending on that ally's type. If the target ally is a guard, a Poxwalker Guard appears in their place. If the target ally is an officer, a Plaguebearer appears in their place.

traits.locale_text: この生物は、死んだ味方の体を吹き飛ばし、その味方のタイプによって{g|Encyclopedia:DecayEffect}腐敗{/g}の子分と入れ替える。ターゲットの味方がガードの場合、ポクスウォーカーの護衛がその場所に現れる。ターゲットの味方が士官の場合、プレーグベアラーがその場所に現れる。

languages.text: Diese Kreatur sprengt einen toten Verbündeten in die Luft und ersetzt ihn abhängig vom Typ des Verbündeten durch einen Diener des {g|Encyclopedia:DecayEffect}Verfalls{/g}. Ist der anvisierte Verbündete ein Wächter, erscheint an seiner Stelle der Seuchenwandler-Wächter. Ist der anvisierte Verbündete ein Offizier, erscheint an seiner Stelle ein Seuchenhüter.
languages.original_text: This creature blows up a dead ally's body, replacing it with a minion of {g|Encyclopedia:DecayEffect}decay{/g} depending on that ally's type. If the target ally is a guard, a Poxwalker Guard appears in their place. If the target ally is an officer, a Plaguebearer appears in their place.

Ist der anvisierte Verbündete ein Wächter, erscheint an seiner Stelle der Seuchenwandler-Wächter. Ist der anvisierte Verbündete ein Offizier, erscheint an seiner Stelle ein Seuchenhüter.
